titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Education and Workforce in the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Education and Workforce in the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: House Committee on Education and Workforce

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Education and Workforce for the 119th Congress.
